Accommodation

We have pre-booked rooms at the following places. Please contact the locations directly to make a booking and quote "Summer School - Speech Science Technology". If you plan to attend the Australasian Language Technology workshop or other events that are part of SST 2004 you will also need to quote "Conference - Speech Science Technology". Book early, since all the places are limited. All of the locations are conveniently located within walking distance of Macquarie University campus.

Stamford - North Ryde

Cnr Epping and Herring Roads
North Ryde
 www.stamford.com.au
Tel: +61 (0)2 9888 1077
Fax: +61 (2)2 9805 0655

Price: AUD$170 per room/night (single - Palm View Suite)

Travelodge - Macquarie North Ryde

81 Talavera Road
North Ryde 2113
 www.travelodge.com.au
Tel: +61 (0)2 8874 5200 Fax: +61 (0)2 8874 5300

Price: AUD$129 per room/night (single/double/twin)

Dunmore Lang College

130-134 Herring Rd
North Ryde 2113
 www.dunmorelangcollege.nsw.edu.au
Tel: +61 (0)2 9856 1000
Fax: +61 (0)2 9856 1009

Price (bed and breakfast):

  • AUD$55 per room/night (single - student room with share bathroom)
  • AUD$75 per room/night (single - motel ensuite room)
  • AUD$100 per room/night (double/twin - motel ensuite room)

Robert Menzies College

136 Herring Rd
North Ryde 2113
 www.mq.edu.au/rmc/
Tel: +61 (0)2 9936 6000
Fax: +61 (0)2 9936 6005

Price:

  • AUD$58 per room/day (single - student room with breakfast)
  • AUD$68 per room/day (single - student room with 3 meals)
  • AUD$65 per room/day (single - ensuite with breakfast)
  • AUD$75 per room/day (single - ensuite with 3 meals)
  • AUD$70 per flat/day (single - flat with self catering)
  • AUD$75 per flat/day (single - flat with breakfast)
  • AUD$90 per flat/day (single - flat with 3 meals)
  • AUD$90 per flat/day (double - flat with self catering)
  • AUD$100 per flat/day (double - flat with breakfast)
  • AUD$135 per flat/day (double - flat with 3 meals)
